Job title: Software QA Engineer / Python & JavaScript Developer
Posting date: 7/19/2018
Job Location: North York
Company: Networkers
Entry point: https://www.engineerjobs.com/jobdetails.php?lnk=fmw3BpX8lMF9wUZwXxUe2NeZg0n7dOvWz4LkgtxUbD-3Z9W14t3KNIt1Ozl8cnrhz_peOMwOul3gM7Osnf0oKenXfaSchh6zeoeuIwI0_5jU8T5ANl_7l5qz094Q6GMk-CAgxgvAGJH7z7g2zByqZmsr1SjNI2JfYZ9Pxo-nPq4d6UPZiDIGJhZdjdI7NHbrcaiVKo4TAdTVlj21grXLBegF2aotdzaZcfAdB4iKY_bOwMnRZG2YJTWxZLhbGk33nuH9VY-8IzOln8OFLvpIuhDMNBG9BT9xwkMVGxKRcpZG2ji0Aaj7erzbqjjcdRSA_9ZoGEEbC408rTHoGr5pGit_DWqNSz-86vn19KA7bfcQLHJLc4Ggq3Eryr0QzTZ8NgoLmSFfzcfTp7uoWsyV3KIspb4mDRX26BlwU1oJReoH7vtxS2lvzU22amrleSsSEg6blmaaE-zrfE28ix-7CC3TCxOB9lQZ_hYddgZnekZ5te9DCkYUPegWhNdDm0Q1I01X9SfFei3DngY4D0rD7e0Ugb_8EPeVwNibdFj-dPPmm-JL6BRhui26DQ5VbBuxtAuTALDNGq7Lx7tk1m41gr3lhw&isp=0&el=%2Fjobs%2Fsoftware-engineering%2Fcanada%2Fontario%2F%3Ff%3D1%26page%3D11&jk=YZivTZfBaCiwLQI9NK6BzHIG-D23CFzBElViDU8DAKSdHmVqlY3JYQ
Job ID: 129
Raw description:  Worldwide leader in streaming media whose products empower over half of the world's video channels is looking for a Software QA/Automation Engineer to aid in the ongoing development of products that allow video to reach a broader audience and enable new viewing platforms. Before you know it cable boxes will be a thing of the past, so getting in with the industry leader is positioning yourself to be at the forefront of one of the fastest growing platforms in the world! Developers and programmers meeting the three must-haves are also encouraged to apply. To be considered for this role, you possess these skills: Absolute must-haves:  -Python -JavaScript -Ability to write/develop scripts The more of these, the better:  -C/C++ -Java - VB -Perl - SOAP & REST -XML -Linux -Jenkins or GIT (or other build/source code tools) -Understanding of automation test framework technologies and protocols -Network architecture knowledge, communication protocols in LAN/WAN -3+ years working in agile environment -Designing and improving test automation framework and validation strategies -Strong verbal and written communication skills This role will fill quickly!!! Opportunities like this are ones you don't want to miss!!!! Equal opportunity employer: M/F/D/V Job Types: Full-time, Permanent Salary: $70,000.00 to $80,000.00 /year Apply Now 
            Please review all application instructions before applying to Networkers.
